transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji
Executive: Haan Rahul ji
Customer: Hmm
Executive: Vikrant Kumar bol raha hun IndiaMART se
Customer: Haan haan boliye na sir boliye
Executive: Haan maine abhi aapke whatsapp pe bhi lead send kiya hai
Customer: Dekhiye aap search karke usko consume kar lijiye
Executive: Haan dekhte bas
Executive: Haan aur sir ek aur baat hai
Executive: Ek to jab tak yahan pe aap dekh ke main jaise aapka history dekh raha hun theek hai aap pehle ek to uske baad aapne dobara IndiaMART pe pin nahi kiya theek hai to din mein maine kal bhi bataya tha din mein jab tak aap 8-10 pin nahi karoge theek hai tab tak aapko is lead nahi milegi
Customer: Theek hai theek hai sir aaj karunga na
Executive: Haan haan theek hai theek hai baki calls tum matlab kaisi aati hai jo aapke pass calls aati hai wo teen matlab relevant aati hai ki kaisi aati hai
Customer: Haan ji
Executive: Jo aapke pass calls aati hai incoming calls direct call aati hai jo
Customer: Hmm
Executive: Wo kaisi aati hai sir jaise har month mein teen che haan bataiye
Customer: Ek to bahut kam aati hai
Executive: Haan haan
Customer: Aur jo bhi aati hai wo matlab favorable nahi hoti ya to wo koi chhoti RO ki membrane mangte hai matlab apne kaam ki cheeze nahi mangte hai sir
Executive: Achcha matlab jaise man lijiye 10 call aayi hai 10 call mein call aisi hoti hai ya call ek do call achchi hoti hai
Customer: Hmm
Executive: Ek do call achchi hoti hai
Customer: Haan ek do call achchi theek rehti hai baki usme apne to apne ko abhi tak business kuch nahi mila isse yahi in main dekhiye aapko wahi baat kal main bol raha hun ko kya hota hai ki aap jitna isko consume karoge by leads na sir usse utna aapko calls aayengi abhi dekho main aapko
Customer: Main karwata hun kar raha hun kar raha hun main wahi to keh raha hun na kar raha hun
Executive: Haan haan theek hai aaj mujhe karke aaj sham tak feedback dijiye theek hai
Customer: Theek hai theek hai okay okay
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says calls are less and irrelevant.

- Customer has not received business from IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive advised to consume buyleads for more calls.

- Executive asked for feedback by evening.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, calls, business
